room_title: Escape room "Enter the Machine" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: Enter The Machine in Fremont was really fun! It was our first escape room game ever, and five of us friends beat the room just BARELY in time. Definitely stressful, lots of brain required, and great for working with others. The staff was enthusiastic and kind. Highly recommended!

room_title: Escape room "Enter the Machine" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: Completed Escape the Machine. It was a blast and I would recommend this escape room if anyone asks me. The challenge was good and the room was well designed. I and my team finished it with only minutes to go.

room_title: Escape room "Enter the Machine" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: When I heard about escape rooms the idea sounded pretty cool, but I couldn't really imagine what the experience would be like. We had the time of our lives! The puzzles were just the right level of difficulty. We barely escaped with our lives! I can confidently recommend ninja escape if you like puzzles. I'll definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Enter the Machine" by Ninja Escape in Seattle
review: This was the third time I have been to Ninja Escape. I have now done missions 1-3. I have so much fun doing them. I would recommend this escape room. The puzzles getting your mind working while having fun!!! I can't wait until another room comes about!!!
